Weather: Near Blizzard Conditions
Weather: Near Blizzard ConditionsPowerful storm moves in late tonight.Snow arrives between 3 and 5am. Fairly light initially and may be mix near lake.Snow gets heavier into the afternoon and evening. Near blizzard conditions.Travel will be very difficult Friday afternoon, Friday evening, and Friday night.Wind gusts to 45 mph. 6"-10" of snow expected

Powerful storm moves in late tonight.
Snow arrives between 3 and 5am. Fairly light initially and may be mix near lake.
Snow gets heavier into the afternoon and evening. Near blizzard conditions.
Travel will be very difficult Friday afternoon, Friday evening, and Friday night.
Wind gusts to 45 mph. 6"-10" of snow expected
